Posts.Content: My veins are not good enough for chemo regime so advised to have portacath fitted. This was done under general anaesthetic on Tuesday just gone and I'm in so much pain it's unbelieveable! This hurts MUCH more than lumpectomy and lymph node op' 3 weeks ago. Anyone else had this and any advice please - does it get easier?
Posts.Title: Portacath insertion - mega painful
